member.name: T:Syncfusion.WinForms.DataGridConverter.DataGridToExcelConverter

member.name: P:Syncfusion.WinForms.DataGridConverter.ExcelExportingOptions.CoveredCells
member.summary: Gets or sets CoeveredCells while exporting

member.name: P:Syncfusion.WinForms.DataGridConverter.ExcelExportingOptions.Columns
member.summary: Gets list of columns which includes excluding of ExcludeColumns.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.WinForms.DataGridConverter.ExcelExportingOptions.AllowOutlining
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the groups should export with expand/collapse options or not. There is no indent space maintained if AllowOutlining is set to true. If the grid contains the Details View definition, the AllowOutlining is set to true internally.
member.value: true if Outlining is enabled; otherwise, false.The default value is true.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.WinForms.DataGridConverter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExportUnboundRows
member.summary: Gets or sets the value which indicates whether the UnBoundRows should be exported or not
member.value: true if UnBoundRows should be exported; otherwise, false.The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.WinForms.DataGridConverter.ExcelExportingOptions.DefaultColumnWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the default column width in Excel sheet for all columns. This is applicable when disabling ExportColumnWidth.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.WinForms.DataGridConverter.ExcelExportingOptions.DefaultRowHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the default row height in Excel sheet for all rows. This is applicable when disabling ExportRowHeight.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.WinForms.DataGridConverter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExportGroupSummary
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether group summary should be exported or not.
member.value: true if GroupSummary should be exported; otherwise, false.The default value is true.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.WinForms.DataGridConverter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExportTableSummary
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether table summary should be exported or not.
member.value: true if TableSummary should be exported; otherwise, false.The default value is true.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.WinForms.DataGridConverter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExportBorders
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether borders should be exported or not. This is applicable when enabling ExportStyle.
member.value: true if border should be exported; otherwise, false.The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.WinForms.DataGridConverter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExportColumnWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether columns width is should be exported or not.
member.value: true if column width should be exported; otherwise, false.The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.WinForms.DataGridConverter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExportRowHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether row height should be exported or not.
member.value: true if row height should be exported; otherwise, false.The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.WinForms.DataGridConverter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExcelVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the value which specifies workbook version
member.value: One of the enumeration that specifies the excel version. The default mode is .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.WinForms.DataGridConverter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExportAllPages
member.summary: Gets or sets the value which specifies whether all pages should be exported for PagedCollection.By default, only current page will be exported
member.value: true if all pages should be exported; otherwise, false.The default value is false.
member.remarks: This option is not supported with OnDemandPaging.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.WinForms.DataGridConverter.ExcelExportingOptions.StartColumnIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the value which specifies start column index in Excel.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.WinForms.DataGridConverter.ExcelExportingOptions.StartRowIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the value which specifies start row index in Excel.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.WinForms.DataGridConverter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExportPageOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets the value which specifies how paged collection should be exported to excel
member.value: One of the enumeration that specifies the ExportPageOptions. The default mode is .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.WinForms.DataGridConverter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExportMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the value which specifies how the data should be exported to excel
member.value: One of the enumeration that specifies the ExportMode. The default mode is .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.WinForms.DataGridConverter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExportStackedHeaders
member.summary: Gets or sets the value which indicates whether stacked headers should be exported or not
member.value: true if StackedHeaders should be exported; otherwise, false.The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.WinForms.DataGridConverter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExportMergedCells
member.summary: Gets or Sets the value which indicates whether the Merged Cells should be exported or not
member.value: true if MergedCells should be exported; otherwise, false.The default value is false.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.WinForms.DataGridConverter.DataGridPdfExportExtension.ExportToPdf(Syncfusion.WinForms.DataGrid.SfDataGrid,System.String,System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection{System.Object},Syncfusion.WinForms.DataGridConverter.PdfExportingOptions)
member.summary: Exports the selected items of DataGrid to Pdf document with the file name.
member.param: Specifies the file name of exporting pdf document.
Specifies the instance of class which is used to set the exporting options.
member.remarks: Only the DataRow is exported, other than data row is not exported (GroupSummary, CaptionSummary, TableSummary).

member.name: T:Syncfusion.WinForms.DataGridConverter.PdfExportingOptions
member.summary: Class which is used to set the exporting options. User can pass the instance of this class as an argument to the ExportToPdf and ExportToPdfGrid methods.
